comment.body: i was just wondering how meshnets work and found this dumb shit

I remember getting invited to Minds randomly. Looked around. Just saw a bunch of neo-nazis. Was fun. Lets see if this place is any better. Remember, Facebook is private. They can shut anyone up. They also don't have the power of a government so like, it's not a big deal. As long as we make sure the government doesn't get that power. Which, at least in the USA, they don't.
Should be able to make it sorted by most liked or oldest first, unless you can and i'm just dumb...
